requestParams.name: source
requestParams.desc: 请求来源（需调用方自定义标识：OPEN_XXXX）

requestParams.name: warehouse_id
requestParams.desc: 门店或独立仓id   注意：连锁版必填

requestDemos.code:
token = auth.Token(token='token') #auth.Sign(app_id='app_id', app_secret='app_secret')

client = YZClient(token)

params={}

params['business_order_no']="SPD180829110504371425"
params['is_finish']="true"
params['remark']=""
params['source']="OPEN_EDB"
params['update_items']="[{"real_amount" : 30000, "sku_id" : 7394032, "sku_no" : "P180828894631948", "product_name" : "edb", "unit" : "个", "specifications" : "白色-d" }, { "real_amount" : 28000, "sku_id" : 7394017, "sku_no" : "P180828192277949", "product_name" : "edb", "unit" : "个", "specifications" : "白色-c" }]"
params['warehouse_id']=41378507

files=[]

print client.invoke('youzan.retail.stock.stockcheck.update', '3.0.0', 'POST', params=params, files=files)

'SPD180829110504371425', 'is_finish' => 'true', 'remark' => '', 'source' => 'OPEN_EDB', 'update_items' => '[{"real_amount" : 30000, "sku_id" : 7394032, "sku_no" : "P180828894631948", "product_name" : "edb", "unit" : "个", "specifications" : "白色-d" }, { "real_amount" : 28000, "sku_id" : 7394017, "sku_no" : "P180828192277949", "product_name" : "edb", "unit" : "个", "specifications" : "白色-c" }]', 'warehouse_id' => '41378507', ]; $my_files = [ ]; echo '
';
var_dump(
    $client->post($method, $api_version, $my_params, $my_files)
);
echo '
';
